name: Athletics
description: Encompassing one’s physical fitness and training of the body, Athletics applies to all those situations in which strength and endurance are both required. Characters trained in Athletics can get away from assassins climbing walls, long-distance jumping from one rooftop to the next, or just plain outrunning everyone.
advantages: The sports match take place on your ‘home turf’
disadvantages: Trying to climb a sheer slope
sample_tests: Jumping from one rooftop to another (DN 10)
